selected_quotes: @bokkiedog Plug the URL into to read Kenyon's summary.
@SilverVVulpes Most mechanisms listed there are profoundly modified by keto/all-meat diet.
@balajis Keto diet strongly affects the signalling pathways listed in Kenyon's survey: … @smenor @JDcarlu

citation.abstract: The nematode Caenorhabditis elegans ages and dies in a few weeks, but humans can live for 100 years or more. Assuming that the ancestor we share with nematodes aged rapidly, this means that over evolutionary time mutations have increased lifespan more than 2,000-fold. Which genes can extend lifespan? Can we augment their activities and live even longer? After centuries of wistful poetry and wild imagination, we are now getting answers, often unexpected ones, to these fundamental questions.
citation.title: The genetics of ageing

blogs.title: What the humble worm might tell us about doubling our lifespan
blogs.summary: Dr. Alison Woollard, 2013 Christmas lecturer, tells us about how studying the worm C. elegans can help us understand the ageing process.

news.title: Peut-on inverser la courbe du vieillissement?
news.summary: Grâce à un protocole expérimental tirant profit des recherches sur les cellules souches pluripotentes induites, des scientifiques ont réussi à rajeunir des souris et à leur offrir 30% de longévité supplémentaires.

news.title: Medical research: Treat ageing
news.summary: By 2050, the number of people over the age of 80 will triple globally. These demographics could come at great cost to individuals and economies. Two groups describe how research in animals and humans should be refocused to find ways to delay the onset of f

wikipedia.title: Insulin-like growth factor
wikipedia.summary: The insulin-like growth factors (IGFs) are proteins with high sequence similarity to insulin.

wikipedia.title: Gary Ruvkun
wikipedia.summary: Gary Bruce Ruvkun (born 26 March 1952, Berkeley, California) is an American molecular biologist at Massachusetts General Hospital and professor of genetics at Harvard Medical School in Boston.
